Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Northeastern in 1977...
Had first career hit on 4/29/1979, off Jeremiah Aden (Mal)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/28/1979, off Cleveland Benson (PIT)...
Drove in 6 runs against Malibu on 6/11/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1984, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Third Base in 1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1985, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Malibu on 6/8/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Coney Island, driving in 9 runs on 6/22/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1988, hitting .600 with 0 HR, 4 RBI...
Had 23-game hitting streak snapped on 4/11/1988...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1988, hitting .409 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Traded from Northeastern to Boston (UBA) on 7/20/1989 (Going to PIL: 1B R. Cameron, CF C. Acosta. Going to NE: P J. Moon, P J. Dunbar, P A. Kidwell)...
Drove in 7 runs against Northeastern on 6/10/1990...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Wisconsin on 9/18/1990...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/7/1992, off Scott Erb (DIA)...
